function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Homogeneous mixing conditions (G=1) leading to increased disease spreading","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and larger outbreaks","Mitigation":"Introduce heterogeneous contact networks to reduce indiscriminate interactions","Technologies":"Network modeling and analysis tools","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations, policymakers, urban planners"},{"Description":"Variability in contact rates based on age, sex, employment status, and other characteristics","Impact":"Unexplained variations causing statistical uncertainty in reported mean contact rates","Mitigation":"Detailed subgroup analysis and identification of contact rate variability sources","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling tools","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Crowding driven by urbanization and mobility patterns increasing the growth-rate and size of infectious outbreaks","Impact":"Higher risk of larger infectious outbreaks","Mitigation":"Urban planning and infrastructure improvements to reduce crowding, promoting alternative transportation modes","Technologies":"Urban planning and simulation tools, transportation management systems","People":"Urban residents, commuters, local governments","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, transportation agencies"}]}
